title: What if aliens invaded India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why India of all earth? Okay, let's see if we can answer this( for argument sake ofcourse).Let's take the human warfare methodology to construct this scenario. Alien scout ships start small scale fire followed by heavy ships with a massive attack. The whole world witnesses this invasion and US , Russia etc start using their secret weapons developed with the help of aliens and start counter-attacking. Of all the species out there in this vast universe, few peace loving beings like the Sphere beings, Blue Avians etc come to our rescue. Catastrophic destruction ensues and the result would be a no win- no lose scenario (as usual). But the most important thing of all, the world will know that E.Ts exist and they will start waking up from chained up dreams. Cheers to freedom. Edit 1: If not the above procedure, they will just drop a few of their tiny shells and the entire nation if not the continent will be engulfed in fire.

If aliens invade India Arvind Kejriwal will ask PM to apologize.Set Max will play Koi mil gaya 24*7. (RIP Suryavansham)Modi will invite them for Make in India.They will be found in queues outside banks for exchanging currency.Their leader along with marvel and DC heros will have special dinner on moon with Rajnikant.1.25 billion Indians will hope Aliens will help to bring back black money and they'll get 15 lakhs in their account.Baba ramdev's patanjali will be in danger.BBC will again find some flaws in selection of Aliens to first invade India. This will be followed by a documentary which will be banned after debate in Parliament.
